trans-unit.resname: MAT·1 | Coppercoat Vanguard | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 紫铜军先锋

trans-unit.resname: MAT·1 | Coppercoat Vanguard | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each other Human you control gets +1/+0 and has ward {1}. (Whenever it becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {1}.)
trans-unit.target: 每个由你操控的其他人类均得+1/+0且各具有守护{1}。（每当所结附的生物成为由对手操控之咒语或异能的目标时，除非该牌手支付{1}，否则反击之。）

trans-unit.resname: MAT·2 | Deification | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 奉若神明

trans-unit.resname: MAT·2 | Deification | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a planeswalker type.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择一种鹏洛客类别。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·2 | Deification | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Planeswalkers you control of the chosen type have hexproof.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的该类别鹏洛客具有辟邪异能。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·2 | Deification | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: As long as you control a creature, if damage dealt to a planeswalker you control of the chosen type would result in all loyalty counters on it being removed, instead all but one of those counters are removed.
trans-unit.target: 只要你操控生物，如果对任一由你操控的该类别鹏洛客造成之伤害将移去其上所有忠诚指示物，则改为留下一个此类指示物并将其余的移去。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·3 | Harnessed Snubhorn | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 佩挽短角龙

trans-unit.resname: MAT·3 | Harnessed Snubhorn | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.target: 警戒

trans-unit.resname: MAT·3 | Harnessed Snubhorn | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，将目标神器或结界牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·4 | Metropolis Reformer | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 都会变革使

trans-unit.resname: MAT·4 | Metropolis Reformer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.target: 飞行，警戒

trans-unit.resname: MAT·4 | Metropolis Reformer | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.target: 你具有辟邪异能。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·4 | Metropolis Reformer | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME is dealt damage, you gain that much life.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME受到伤害时，你获得等量的生命。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·5 | Spark Rupture | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 火花破裂

trans-unit.resname: MAT·5 | Spark Rupture | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·5 | Spark Rupture | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Each planeswalker with one or more loyalty counters on it loses all abilities and is a creature with power and toughness each equal to the number of loyalty counters on it.
trans-unit.target: 对每个其上有一个或数个忠诚指示物的鹏洛客而言，它失去所有异能，且是力量和防御力各等同于其上忠诚指示物数量的生物。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·6 | Tazri, Stalwart Survivor | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 坚念余生者塔兹莉

trans-unit.resname: MAT·6 | Tazri, Stalwart Survivor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each creature you control has "{T}: Add one mana of any of this creature's colors. Spend this mana only to activate an ability of a creature. Activate only if this creature has another activated ability."
trans-unit.target: 每个由你操控的生物均具有「{T}：加一点法术力，其颜色为此生物的任一颜色。此法术力只能用来起动生物的异能。只能于此生物有另一个起动式异能时起动。」

trans-unit.resname: MAT·6 | Tazri, Stalwart Survivor | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}, {T}: Mill five cards. Put all creature cards with activated abilities that aren't mana abilities from among the milled cards into your hand.
trans-unit.target: {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}，{T}：磨五张牌。从所磨掉之牌中将所有具有不属于法术力异能之起动式异能的生物牌置于你手上。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·7 | Filter Out | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 过滤洁净

trans-unit.resname: MAT·7 | Filter Out | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return all noncreature, nonland permanents to their owners' hands.
trans-unit.target: 将所有非生物且非地的永久物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·8 | Tolarian Contempt | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 陶拉里亚式轻蔑

trans-unit.resname: MAT·8 | Tolarian Contempt | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, put a rejection counter on each creature your opponents control.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，在每个由对手操控的生物上各放置一个拒斥指示物。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·8 | Tolarian Contempt | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, for each opponent, choose up to one target creature they control with a rejection counter on it. That creature's owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，为每位对手各选择至多一个目标由其操控且上面有拒斥指示物的生物。该生物的拥有者将它置于其牌库顶或牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·10 | Vesuvan Drifter | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 维苏瓦漂泊者

trans-unit.resname: MAT·10 | Vesuvan Drifter | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: MAT·10 | Vesuvan Drifter | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: You may look at the top card of your library any time.
trans-unit.target: 你可以随时检视你的牌库顶牌。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·10 | Vesuvan Drifter | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each combat, you may reveal the top card of your library. If you reveal a creature card this way, CARDNAME becomes a copy of that card until end of turn, except it has flying.
trans-unit.target: 在每次战斗开始时，你可以展示你的牌库顶牌。若你以此法展示出一张生物牌，则CARDNAME成为该牌的复制品直到回合结束，但它具有飞行异能。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·11 | Ayara's Oathsworn | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 阿娅拉的守誓骑士

trans-unit.resname: MAT·11 | Ayara's Oathsworn | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.target: 威慑

trans-unit.resname: MAT·11 | Ayara's Oathsworn | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, if it has fewer than four +1/+1 counters on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has exactly four +1/+1 counters on it, search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，若其上的+1/+1指示物数量少于四个，则在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。然后如果其上正好有四个+1/+1指示物，则从你牌库中搜寻一张牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·12 | Blot Out | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 清除干净

trans-unit.resname: MAT·12 | Blot Out | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target opponent exiles a creature or planeswalker they control with the greatest mana value among creatures and planeswalkers they control.
trans-unit.target: 目标对手放逐一个由其操控的生物或鹏洛客，且须是由其操控的生物和鹏洛客中法术力值最大者。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·13 | Death-Rattle Oni | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 撼亡邪鬼

trans-unit.resname: MAT·13 | Death-Rattle Oni | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.target: 闪现

trans-unit.resname: MAT·13 | Death-Rattle Oni | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {2} less to cast for each creature that died this turn.
trans-unit.target: 本回合中每有一个生物死去，此咒语便减少{2}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·13 | Death-Rattle Oni | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, destroy all other creatures that were dealt damage this turn.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，消灭所有本回合中受过伤害的其他生物。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·14 | Markov Baron | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 马可夫男爵

trans-unit.resname: MAT·14 | Markov Baron | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
trans-unit.target: 召集（此咒语能用你的生物来协助施放。你于施放此咒语时每横置一个生物，就能为此咒语支付{1}或一点该生物颜色之法术力。）

trans-unit.resname: MAT·14 | Markov Baron | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.target: 系命

trans-unit.resname: MAT·14 | Markov Baron | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的其他吸血鬼得+1/+1。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·14 | Markov Baron | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: Madness {2}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 疯魔{2}{B}（如果你弃掉此牌，将之弃到放逐区。当你如此作时，支付其疯魔费用施放之，否则便将其置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: MAT·15 | Urborg Scavengers | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 乌尔博格拾荒灵

trans-unit.resname: MAT·15 | Urborg Scavengers | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME enters the battlefield or attacks, exile target card from a graveyard. Put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME进战场或攻击时，将目标牌从坟墓场放逐。在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·15 | Urborg Scavengers | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME has flying as long as a card exiled with it has flying. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, trample, and vigilance.
trans-unit.target: 只要以它放逐的某张牌具有飞行异能，CARDNAME便具有飞行异能。且先攻、连击、死触、敏捷、辟邪、不灭、系命、威慑、延势、践踏与警戒异能亦比照办理。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·16 | Arni Metalbrow | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 钢角亚尼

trans-unit.resname: MAT·16 | Arni Metalbrow | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control attacks or a creature enters the battlefield under your control attacking, you may pay {1}{R}. If you do, you may put a creature card with mana value less than that creature's mana value from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的生物攻击或一个生物以正进行攻击之状态在你的操控下进战场时，你可以支付{1}{R}。若你如此作，则你可以将一张法术力值小于该生物的生物牌从你手上横置放进战场，且正进行攻击。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·17 | Kolaghan Warmonger | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 寇安甘族好战者

trans-unit.resname: MAT·17 | Kolaghan Warmonger | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.target: 敏捷

trans-unit.resname: MAT·17 | Kolaghan Warmonger | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal a Dragon card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，检视你牌库顶的六张牌。你可以展示其中一张龙牌并置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·18 | Plargg and Nassari | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 帕葛与纳撒理

trans-unit.resname: MAT·18 | Plargg and Nassari | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, each player exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile a nonland card. An opponent chooses a nonland card exiled this way. You may cast up to two spells from among the other cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，每位牌手各从其牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张非地牌为止。任一对手选择一张以此法放逐的非地牌。你可以从依此法放逐的其他牌之中施放至多两个咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·19 | Reckless Handling | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 鲁莽处置

trans-unit.resname: MAT·19 | Reckless Handling | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for an artifact card, reveal it, put it into your hand, shuffle, then discard a card at random. If an artifact card was discarded this way, CARDNAME deals 2 damage to each opponent.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张神器牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，洗牌，然后随机弃一张牌。如果以此法弃掉一张神器牌，则CARDNAME向每位对手各造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·20 | Animist's Might | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 物灵师之力

trans-unit.resname: MAT·20 | Animist's Might | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets a legendary creature you control.
trans-unit.target: 如果此咒语以由你操控的传奇生物为目标，则它减少{2}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·20 | Animist's Might | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Target creature you control deals damage equal to twice its power to target creature or planeswalker you don't control.
trans-unit.target: 目标由你操控的生物对目标不由你操控的生物或鹏洛客造成伤害，其数量等同于前者力量的两倍。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·21 | Leyline Immersion | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 地脉通感

trans-unit.resname: MAT·21 | Leyline Immersion | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.target: 结附于传奇生物

trans-unit.resname: MAT·21 | Leyline Immersion | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature has ward {2} and "{T}: Add five mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to cast spells."
trans-unit.target: 所结附的生物具有守护{2}与「{T}：加五点法术力，其颜色组合由你选择。此法术力只能用来施放咒语。」

trans-unit.resname: MAT·22 | Nissa, Resurgent Animist | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 复生物灵师妮莎

trans-unit.resname: MAT·22 | Nissa, Resurgent Animist | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, add one mana of any color. Then if this is the second time this ability has resolved this turn, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal an Elf or Elemental card. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，加一点任意颜色的法术力。然后如果这是此异能在本回合第二次的结算，则从你的牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出一张妖精或元素牌为止。将该牌置于你手上，其余则以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·23 | Open the Way | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 打开通路

trans-unit.resname: MAT·23 | Open the Way | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: X can't be greater than the number of players in the game.
trans-unit.target: X不能大于这盘游戏中的牌手数量。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·23 | Open the Way | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal X land cards. Put those land cards onto the battlefield tapped and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出X张地牌为止。将这些地牌横置放进战场，其余则以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·24 | Tranquil Frillback | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 安详鳍背龙

trans-unit.resname: MAT·24 | Tranquil Frillback | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may pay {G} up to three times. When you pay this cost one or more times, choose up to that many —
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以支付至多三次{G}。当你支付一次或数次此费用时，选择至多等量的模式～

trans-unit.resname: MAT·24 | Tranquil Frillback | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.target: •消灭目标神器或结界。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·24 | Tranquil Frillback | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.target: •放逐目标牌手的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·24 | Tranquil Frillback | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.target: •你获得4点生命。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·25 | Undercity Upheaval | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 地底城动荡

trans-unit.resname: MAT·25 | Undercity Upheaval | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Undergrowth — Distribute X +1/+1 counters among any number of target creatures you control, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard as you cast this spell. Creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 朽力～将X个+1/+1指示物分配给任意数量目标由你操控的生物，X为于你施放此咒语时你坟墓场中的生物牌数量。由你操控的生物获得警戒异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·26 | Calix, Guided by Fate | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 命缚丝引凯利斯

trans-unit.resname: MAT·26 | Calix, Guided by Fate | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Constellation — Whenever CARDNAME or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
trans-unit.target: 星彩～每当CARDNAME或另一个结界在你的操控下进战场时，在目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·26 | Calix, Guided by Fate | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Calix or an enchanted creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may create a token that's a copy of a nonlegendary enchantment you control. Do this only once each turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当凯利斯或一个由你操控且受有灵气的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，你可以派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为一个由你操控的非传奇结界之复制品。每回合只能如此作一次。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·27 | Campus Renovation | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 整修校区

trans-unit.resname: MAT·27 | Campus Renovation | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return up to one target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.
trans-unit.target: 将至多一张目标神器或结界牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。放逐你牌库顶的两张牌。直到你下一个回合的回合结束，你可以使用这些牌。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·28 | Cosmic Rebirth | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 寰宇新生

trans-unit.resname: MAT·28 | Cosmic Rebirth | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose target permanent card in your graveyard. If it has mana value 3 or less, you may put it onto the battlefield. If you don't put it onto the battlefield, put it into your hand.
trans-unit.target: 选择目标在你坟墓场中的永久物牌。如果它的法术力值等于或小于3，则你可以将它放进战场。如果你未将它放进战场，则将它置于你手上。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·28 | Cosmic Rebirth | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.target: 你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·29 | Danitha, New Benalia's Light | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 新宾纳里亚之光达妮莎

trans-unit.resname: MAT·29 | Danitha, New Benalia's Light | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.target: 警戒，践踏，系命

trans-unit.resname: MAT·29 | Danitha, New Benalia's Light | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Once during each of your turns, you may cast an Aura or Equipment spell from your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 仅于你的每个回合中且限一次，你可以从你坟墓场中施放灵气或结界咒语。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·30 | Feast of the Victorious Dead | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 英灵庆功宴

trans-unit.resname: MAT·30 | Feast of the Victorious Dead | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, if one or more creatures died this turn, you gain that much life and distribute that many +1/+1 counters among creatures you control.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，若本回合中有一个或数个生物死去，则你获得等量生命，并将等量的+1/+1指示物分配给由你操控的生物。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·31 | Gold-Forged Thopteryx | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 金铸振翼龙

trans-unit.resname: MAT·31 | Gold-Forged Thopteryx | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.target: 飞行，系命

trans-unit.resname: MAT·31 | Gold-Forged Thopteryx | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Each legendary permanent you control has ward {2}. (Whenever it becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)
trans-unit.target: 每个由你操控的传奇永久物均具有守护{2}。（每当它成为由对手操控之咒语或异能的目标时，除非该牌手支付{2}，否则反击之。）

trans-unit.resname: MAT·32 | Jirina, Dauntless General | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 不屈将军杰琳娜

trans-unit.resname: MAT·32 | Jirina, Dauntless General | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile target player's graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，放逐目标牌手的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·32 | Jirina, Dauntless General | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice Jirina: Humans you control gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲杰琳娜：由你操控的人类获得辟邪与不灭异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·33 | Jolrael, Voice of Zhalfir | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 赛费尔之声裘蕾尔

trans-unit.resname: MAT·33 | Jolrael, Voice of Zhalfir | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on your turn, up to one target land you control becomes an X/X green and blue Bird creature with flying and haste until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand. It's still a land.
trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，至多一个目标由你操控的地成为X/X，绿蓝双色，具飞行与敏捷异能的鸟生物直到回合结束，X为你的手牌数量。它仍然是地。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·33 | Jolrael, Voice of Zhalfir | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a land creature you control deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的地生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·34 | The Kenriths' Royal Funeral | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 肯理斯皇室葬礼

trans-unit.resname: MAT·34 | The Kenriths' Royal Funeral | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile up to two target legendary creature cards from your graveyard. You draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the greatest mana value among cards exiled this way.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，将至多两张目标传奇生物牌从你的坟墓场放逐。你抓X张牌且失去X点生命，X为以此法放逐之牌中的最大法术力值。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·34 | The Kenriths' Royal Funeral | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Legendary spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each card exiled with CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每有一张以CARDNAME放逐的牌，你施放的传奇咒语便减少{1}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·35 | Kiora, Sovereign of the Deep | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 深洋君王奇奥拉

trans-unit.resname: MAT·35 | Kiora, Sovereign of the Deep | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.target: 警戒，守护{3}

trans-unit.resname: MAT·35 | Kiora, Sovereign of the Deep | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a Kraken, Leviathan, Octopus, or Serpent spell from your hand, look at the top X cards of your library, where X is that spell's mana value. You may cast a spell with mana value less than X from among them without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 每当你从你手上施放巨海兽，海怪，章鱼或巨蛇咒语时，检视你牌库顶的X张牌，X为该咒语的法术力值。你可以从其中施放一个法术力值小于X的咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·36 | Nahiri, Forged in Fury | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 怒火熔铸娜希丽

trans-unit.resname: MAT·36 | Nahiri, Forged in Fury | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Affinity for Equipment (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Equipment you control.)
trans-unit.target: 武具共鸣（你每操控一个武具，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。）

trans-unit.resname: MAT·36 | Nahiri, Forged in Fury | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever an equipped creature you control attacks, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. You may cast Equipment spells this way without paying their mana costs.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控且佩带武具的生物攻击时，放逐你的牌库顶牌。本回合中，你可以使用该牌。你可以依此法施放武具咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·37 | Nahiri's Resolve | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 娜希丽的决心

trans-unit.resname: MAT·37 | Nahiri's Resolve | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control get +1/+0 and have haste.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物得+1/+0且具有敏捷异能。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·37 | Nahiri's Resolve | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, exile any number of nontoken artifacts and/or creatures you control. Return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of your next upkeep.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，放逐任意数量由你操控且非衍生物的神器和／或生物。在你的下一个维持开始时，将这些牌在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·38 | Narset, Enlightened Exile | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 受启黜人娜尔施

trans-unit.resname: MAT·38 | Narset, Enlightened Exile | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物具有灵技异能。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·38 | Narset, Enlightened Exile | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, exile target noncreature, nonland card with mana value less than Narset's power from a graveyard and copy it. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，将目标既非生物也非地、且法术力值小于娜尔施力量的牌从坟墓场放逐并将它复制。你可以施放该复制品，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·39 | Nashi, Moon's Legacy | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 月智传承哪失

trans-unit.resname: MAT·39 | Nashi, Moon's Legacy | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.target: 威慑，守护{1}

trans-unit.resname: MAT·39 | Nashi, Moon's Legacy | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, exile up to one target legendary or Rat card from your graveyard and copy it. You may cast the copy. (You still pay its costs. A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，将至多一张目标传奇或老鼠牌从你的坟墓场放逐并将它复制。你可以施放该复制品。（你依旧要支付其费用，永久物咒语的复制品会成为衍生物。）

trans-unit.resname: MAT·40 | Niv-Mizzet, Supreme | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 至尊尼米捷

trans-unit.resname: MAT·40 | Niv-Mizzet, Supreme | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.target: 飞行，反单色辟邪

trans-unit.resname: MAT·40 | Niv-Mizzet, Supreme | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard that's exactly two colors has jump-start. (You may cast that card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: 你坟墓场中每张正好两色的瞬间与法术牌均具有再起异能。（你可以从你的坟墓场施放该牌，但必须支付其所需费用并额外弃一张牌。然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.resname: MAT·41 | Ob Nixilis, Captive Kingpin | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 受困魔头欧尼希兹

trans-unit.resname: MAT·41 | Ob Nixilis, Captive Kingpin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.target: 飞行，践踏

trans-unit.resname: MAT·41 | Ob Nixilis, Captive Kingpin | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more opponents each lose exactly 1 life, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME. Exile the top card of your library. Until your next end step, you may play that card.
trans-unit.target: 每当一位或多位对手各失去正好1点生命时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。放逐你的牌库顶牌。直到你的下一个结束步骤，你可以使用该牌。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·42 | Pia Nalaar, Consul of Revival | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 复兴执政琵雅纳拉

trans-unit.resname: MAT·42 | Pia Nalaar, Consul of Revival | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的振翼机具有敏捷异能。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·42 | Pia Nalaar, Consul of Revival | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you play a land from exile or cast a spell from exile, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 每当你从放逐区使用地或从放逐区施放咒语时，派出一个1/1无色，具飞行异能的振翼机衍生神器生物。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·43 | Rebuild the City | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 重建都会

trans-unit.resname: MAT·43 | Rebuild the City | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose target land. Create three tokens that are copies of it, except they're 3/3 creatures in addition to their other types and they have vigilance and menace. (They're affected by summoning sickness.)
trans-unit.target: 选择目标地。派出三个为其复制品的衍生物，但它们是额外是3/3生物，且具有警戒与威慑异能。（它们会受召唤失调影响。）

trans-unit.resname: MAT·44 | Rocco, Street Chef | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 街头主厨罗孔

trans-unit.resname: MAT·44 | Rocco, Street Chef | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, each player exiles the top card of their library. Until your next end step, each player may play the card they exiled this way.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，每位牌手各放逐其牌库顶牌。直到你的下一个结束步骤，每位牌手各可以使用其以此法放逐的牌。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·44 | Rocco, Street Chef | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player plays a land from exile or casts a spell from exile, you put a +1/+1 counter on target creature and create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
trans-unit.target: 每当任一牌手从放逐区使用地或从放逐区施放咒语时，你在目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物并派出一个食品衍生物。（它是具有「{2}，{T}，牺牲此神器：你获得3点生命」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: MAT·45 | Samut, Vizier of Naktamun | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 拿塔蒙维齐尔撒姆特

trans-unit.resname: MAT·45 | Samut, Vizier of Naktamun | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.target: 先攻，警戒，敏捷

trans-unit.resname: MAT·45 | Samut, Vizier of Naktamun | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, if that creature entered the battlefield this turn, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，若该生物是于本回合进战场，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·46 | Sarkhan, Soul Aflame | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 昂焰灵魂萨坎

trans-unit.resname: MAT·46 | Sarkhan, Soul Aflame | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
trans-unit.target: 你施放的龙咒语减少{1}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·46 | Sarkhan, Soul Aflame | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, you may have CARDNAME become a copy of it until end of turn, except its name is CARDNAME and it's legendary in addition to its other types.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个龙在你的操控下进战场时，你可以使CARDNAME成为前者的复制品直到回合结束，但它的名称是CARDNAME，且额外是传奇。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·47 | Sigarda, Font of Blessings | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 祝福圣源席嘉妲

trans-unit.resname: MAT·47 | Sigarda, Font of Blessings | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: MAT·47 | Sigarda, Font of Blessings | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Other permanents you control have hexproof.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的其他永久物具有辟邪异能。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·47 | Sigarda, Font of Blessings | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: You may look at the top card of your library any time.
trans-unit.target: 你可以随时检视你的牌库顶牌。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·47 | Sigarda, Font of Blessings | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: You may cast Angel spells and Human spells from the top of your library.
trans-unit.target: 你可以从你的牌库顶施放天使咒语和人类咒语。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·48 | Tyvar the Bellicose | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 好战不休泰瓦

trans-unit.resname: MAT·48 | Tyvar the Bellicose | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more Elves you control attack, they gain deathtouch until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当由你操控的一个或数个妖精攻击时，它们获得死触异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·48 | Tyvar the Bellicose | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Each creature you control has "Whenever a mana ability of this creature resolves, put a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the amount of mana this creature produced. This ability triggers only once each turn."
trans-unit.target: 每个由你操控的生物均具有「每当此生物的法术力异能结算时，在其上放置若干+1/+1指示物，数量等同于此生物产生的法术力数量。此异能每回合只会触发一次。」

trans-unit.resname: MAT·49 | Karn, Legacy Reforged | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 神兵重铸卡恩

trans-unit.resname: MAT·49 | Karn, Legacy Reforged | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the greatest mana value among artifacts you control.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME的力量和防御力各等同于由你操控之神器中的最大法术力值。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·49 | Karn, Legacy Reforged | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, add {C} for each artifact you control. This mana can't be spent to cast nonartifact spells. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，你每操控一个神器，便加{C}。此法术力不能用来施放非神器咒语。直到回合结束，你不会因步骤与阶段结束失去这份法术力。

trans-unit.resname: MAT·50 | Drannith Ruins | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 卓尼斯遗迹

trans-unit.resname: MAT·50 | Drannith Ruins | Card Text | Paragraph 1
MAT·50 | Drannith Ruins | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}: Put two +1/+1 counters on target non-Human creature that entered the battlefield this turn.
trans-unit.target: {2}，{T}：在目标本回合进战场的非人类生物上放置两个+1/+1指示物。
